title: shibariumchitchat

content: Utilitiy already live, just tokenomics and contract being created then all tokenomics whitepaper etc will be added in alts pageWebsite - shibariumChitChatA cutting edge social media platform built around Shibarium!Find your favourite Shibarium projects with ease and join in the deiscussions!Trying to help shibarium projects from twitter/x be more easily found, so we will also have a twitter for them to find us better https://twitter.com/shibariumCCWould appreciate if you could subscribe to the twitter and sign up to chit chat.Presale will be coming up soon and we wont be having a large presale we want to start small and grow organically. We will be going live on the shibarium network and paired against bone. So if you want to buy in you will have to have shibarium bone!any questions just ask away for now!
